General.Name: Scandinavian Investment Group A/S
General.Description: Scandinavian Investment Group A/S invests in real estate properties in Denmark. The company also invests in listed and unlisted companies, as well as bonds in Nordic markets. Scandinavian Investment Group A/S was founded in 1908 and is based in Herlev, Denmark.
